author: Yuliya Astapova
storyline:
As your troops drive away the last remaining stragglers of the enemy, the High General, brow knotted in outrage, approaches you.

"That contingent of invaders was wearing Wisteria uniforms! Treachery has wormed its way into our ranks!" He spits in disgust. "I swear I will find out where this began."

You look around you for the first time since the battles began. The sun is setting and dusk is falling on your castle. You hear an approaching clatter of armor and turn to see the infantry companies that have been called back from patrol.

"Ah, at last! We will have infantry support for the next round of battle. And just in time, it seems," the general says as another warhorn call pierces the still air.
title: The First Day of War
